Typealiases.html#/s:11ToosieSlide9CellIn.name: CellIndex
Typealiases.html#/s:11ToosieSlide9CellIn.abstract: A type alias to simulate the idea of a cell index.

Protocols/UICollectionViewDelegateCarous.name: collectionView(_:shouldDisplayCellAt:)
Protocols/UICollectionViewDelegateCarous.abstract: Asks the delegate if the cell at a given CellIndex should been shown on screen.

Protocols/UICollectionViewDelegateCarous.name: collectionView(_:willDisplayCellAt:)
Protocols/UICollectionViewDelegateCarous.abstract: Tells the delegate that the cell at a given CellIndex will be shown on screen.

Protocols/UICollectionViewDelegateCarous.name: UICollectionViewDelegateCarouselLayout
Protocols/UICollectionViewDelegateCarous.abstract: The `UICollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout protocol defines methods that lets you know when and what cell will and is currently being displayed.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.name: init(frame:collectionViewCarouselLayout:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.abstract: A convenient initializer to instantiate a UICollectionView and configure it with a UICollectionViewCarouselLayout

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.name: carouselFlowLayout
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.abstract: Returns an instance of collectionViewLayout down casted to CarouselCollectionViewFlowLayout.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.name: scrollToCell(at:animated:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.abstract: Scrolls the CollectionView to a given cell index.

Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.name: cellForItem(at:)
Extensions/UICollectionView.html#/s:So16.abstract: Returns the visible cell object at the specified CellIndex.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: lowestVelocitySensitivity
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The lowest absolute velocity that should invoke a change of cells.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: currentVisibleCellIndex
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The cell currently being displayed for the user.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: focusedItemHeightScaleFactor
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The scale factor to apply to the focused cell’s height. Defaults to 1.0.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: focusedItemAlphaValue
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The alpha value of the lone focused cell. This defaults to 1.0.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: nonFocusedItemsScaleFactor
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The scale factor to apply to the non focused cells’ height. Defaults to 0.8.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: nonFocusedItemsAlphaValue
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The alpha value of the non focused cells. This defaults to 0.5.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: currentOffset
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The current content offset of the visible cell from the section inset..

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: itemSize
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: The CGSize of the single item inside the cell.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: init()
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Initializes the flow layout with a .horizontal scroll direction.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: init(itemSize:)
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Initializes the flow layout with a .horizontal scroll direction, and sets the itemSize of the single element.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: init(coder:)
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Initializes the flow layout with a .horizontal scroll direction using the NSCoder.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: invalidateLayout()
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Invalidates the current layout and triggers a layout update.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: layoutAttributesForElements(in:)
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Returns the layout attributes for all of the cells and views in the specified rectangle.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: shouldInvalidateLayout(forBoundsChange:)
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Asks the layout object if the new bounds require a layout update.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: prepare()
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Updates the current layout if collection view size have changed.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: targetContentOffset(forProposedContentOffset:withScrollingVelocity:)
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: Returns the point at which to stop scrolling.

Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.name: UICollectionViewCarouselLayout
Classes/UICollectionViewCarouselLayout.h.abstract: A Custom UICollectionViewFlowLayout that simulates a carousel. That is a paginated collection view, with the focused item only in the center of the collection.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
